name: pizza-pos
description: Pizza Shop POS System for Windows Touchscreen Kiosks

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist server/dist client/node_modules server/node_modules node_modules
scripts.deploy:build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
